org.horrabin.horrorss
Class RssImageBean

java.lang.Object
  org.horrabin.horrorss.RssImageBean
public class RssImageBean
extends java.lang.Object

The RssImageBean object represents the element image in an RSS feed. Valid for the RSS 2.0 and RDF specifications

Author:
Fernando Fornieles
